Name: Willi Wonka cocktail
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Muddle strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Cachaça and strawberry with subtle hints of lime and chocolate.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2015 by Carlos Londoño at Café Pacifico London.
Garnish: White chocolate square and half strawberry
